title: Spotify playing via bluetooth
content:
I have a Kenwood DMX701DABS head unit in my car.  Had it for about a year now and it's always bugged me that I cannot get spotify or even Google Play Music to play via bluetooth,  but when I connect my phone with the cable it's fine.  My phone is definitely  connected to the car via bluetooth,  because if I make a call, it works as it should (this is without a cable).

Is there a setting somewhere  that I'm missing ?

Thanks in advance for any help.

Bobby
